basics.name: Patricia Mayo Tejedor
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: I am a 5 years experienced mobile developer, shifting towards full stack engineering. I am proactive, responsible, social and curious, with great expectations for the future. I am eager to learn and improve myself.

work.name: Just Eat
work.summary: Starting working as a native frontend mobile developer (SwiftUI and Kotlin) and now shifting towards backend microservices (in GO using AWS)
highlights: Started learning backend, making microservices in GO using AWS

work.name: IBM
work.summary: I developed mobile apps (with special focus on iOS using Swift) for IBM internal use within an Agile environment.  I've also had the opportunity to work with technologies such as Machine Learning, AI and the IBM Watson Visual Recognition platform. I lead numerous side projects, sometimes taking the role of Scrum Master. I was also part of the IoT focus area group, where we built occupancy sensors from scratch and integrated them into the room reservation system of IBM.

courses: Artificial Intelligence Applications for Human and Sustainable Development

publications.name: A trip to the Science Fair
publications.summary: Best way to prepare for the future is to create it, learn as much as possible, be curious and put your thoughts into action

publications.name: Bring Clarity into Your Own Existence
publications.summary: Having a Philosophy of Life will give you clarity when confronting problems, mundane or abstract, and it will help you make sense of the world and your own existence. Without a personal philosophy, we end up living without direction.

publications.name: What on Earth is Happiness?
publications.summary: Happiness cannot be pursued. Every person must have a reason to 'be happy'
